![Pika-Soft](https://i.imgur.com/HOjiNui.png "Pika-Soft")

#### Некоммерческая организация, занимающаяся разработкой компьютерных игр и модификаций для них. В частности разработкой и запуском игровых серверов Garry's Mod.

## Ссылки
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Blog-Hub-%231b242c?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://hub.pika-soft.ru)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Forum-3b425c?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://forum.pika-soft.ru/)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-%237289da?style=for-the-badge&logo=discord&logoColor=white)](https://discord.gg/3UVxhZj)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Docs-54c7ec?style=for-the-badge&logo=readthedocs&logoColor=white)](https://docs.pika-soft.ru/)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Disk-996fd8?style=for-the-badge&logo=webpack&logoColor=white)](https://disk.pika-soft.ru/)

- [OverBro Death Screen](https://github.com/Pika-Software/OverBro_DeathScreen) ([Steam](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2590889815))
- [Flandre Standby Screen](https://github.com/Pika-Software/flandre_screensaver) ([Steam](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2615576784))

## Бинарные модули

- [Network](https://github.com/Pika-Software/gmsv_network)

- [MyHTTP](https://github.com/Pika-Software/gmsv_myhttp)
- [MongoDB](https://github.com/Pika-Software/gmsv_mongodb)
